itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 121-123 Part 2 : Dr. Alexander L. Baugh
title: Doctrine & Covenants 121-123 Part 2 : Dr. Alexander L. Baugh
description:
In Part 2, Dr. Alex Baugh returns to discuss how the events at Haun’s Mill influence the incarceration at Liberty Jail, the conditions at Liberty Jail, and the difference between enduring and enduring well. Dr. Baugh relates how good and loyal friends are a blessing in times of trial and difficulty.


Shownotes: https://followhim.co/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano

Please rate and review the podcast.
